page.title: 07GARTHORPE RACECOURSE.
page.content: The main part of this racecourse is situated in the south-east corner of the area, although the course itself extends out of the area. This privately owned racecourse (Mrs Newton being the present owner) is used by all the local hunts, including the Belvoir and the Quorn, for point-to- point racing. Much of the course is over the surrounding farmland. The racecourse is also the site of the annual Pony Club camp. The week long camp attracts young riders from the surrounding area who wish to improve their equestrian skills by taking part in the various classes which are arranged throughout the week.
